title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Lead developer for the company's flagship product, a cloud-based project management tool.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented new features using React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Led a team of 5 developers, managing sprint planning and code reviews
Reduced application load time by 40% through performance optimizations
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and Docker

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked on a data visualization platform for business intelligence.
responsibilities: Developed interactive dashboards using Vue.js and D3.js
Built RESTful APIs using Express.js and PostgreSQL
Collaborated with UX designers to improve user experience
Participated in agile development process with bi-weekly sprints

title: Software Development Intern
description: Internship focused on web application development.
responsibilities: Assisted in developing a customer portal using React and Firebase
Created automated tests using Jest and React Testing Library
